duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance and repair of all types of motor vehicles and special equipment in the Verizon fleet.
Diagnose, maintain, and repair all company associated equipment, including aerial lifts, diggers, generators, tools, etc.
Use computer test equipment to diagnose vehicle problems.
Perform OSHA, ANSI, emissions, and state inspections on company vehicles.
Obtain and maintain all required certificates or licenses.

education_certification.credential: 5 or more years' experience as a mechanic or other relevant experience.
CDL License or Commercial Learner's Permit (CDL required within 6 months of hire).
NY State Safety Inspection License (or obtain within 6 months of hire).
Valid state driver's license with a satisfactory driving record.
